title: Make Python GUIs with PyQt5!
content: First, download the QtDesigner application from the this link. Then start by making a main window and explore the widgets that the appoffers! You can name them and add functionality afterwards on your code editor.

title: Add a lightweight database to your Python apps!
content: For this we will need the sqlite3 library for python. You can do not need to install it because it is a built in library. Then just make a connection and a cursor and start typing SQL code!

title: Connect AWS Lambda with S3 Buckets!
content: After you have an account you can create an AWS S3 bucket with the name you desire and a lambda function that uses the latest version of Python. Make a trigger in the Lambda function that will run after a file is uploaded to the bucket and then simply run the code you want.
